name: Jack & Markus
description:
This Projekt is a submission to the Wowie Jam 4.0 2022

A little boy gets lost in a forest and needs to escape the great forestspirits wrath! Luckily a little forest creature wants to help him escape. Join their adventure and watch your forest friend grow into new mysterious creatures. What evolution will you get?

Programmer: Willi Müller (Todes_Ritter),  Andreas Bremser (Andi1411)

Music: Joel Heimann (JokerKang)

Art: Emely Malz (chokorey)
